name: Kids
text: مَا|Not|43|73|262$ضَلَّ|has strayed|98|158|1017$صَاحِبُكُمْ|your companion|124|184|16240$وَمَا|and not|71|131|46$غَوَىٰ|has he erred,|108|138|16241$

name: Kids
text: ذُو مِرَّةٍ|Possessor of soundness.|182|382|16245$فَٱسْتَوَىٰ|And he rose,|104|304|15954$

name: Kids
text: وَهُوَ|While he|76|162|305$بِٱلْأُفُقِ|(was) in the horizon -|165|337|16246$ٱلْأَعْلَىٰ|the highest.|100|186|10009$

name: Kids
text: أَفَتُمَـٰرُونَهُۥ|Then will you dispute with him|220|264|16253$عَلَىٰ|about|63|151|52$مَا|what|53|141|262$يَرَىٰ|he saw?|74|118|1440$

name: Kids
text: عِندَ|Near|56|132|521$سِدْرَةِ|(the) Lote Tree|123|274|16255$ٱلْمُنتَهَىٰ|(of) the utmost boundary,|194|270|16256$

name: Kids
text: أَفَرَءَيْتُمُ|So have you seen|139|227|16260$ٱللَّـٰتَ|the Lat|71|248|16261$وَٱلْعُزَّىٰ|and the Uzza,|112|200|16262$

name: Kids
text: أَلَكُمُ|Is for you|84|138|16265$ٱلذَّكَرُ|the male|77|184|2793$وَلَهُ|and for Him|95|202|5732$ٱلْأُنثَىٰ|the female?|97|151|16266$

name: Kids
text: إِنْ|Not|44|66|225$هِىَ|they|53|97|665$إِلَّآ|(are) except|103|147|86$أَسْمَآءٌ|names|77|121|16269$سَمَّيْتُمُوهَآ|you have named them,|172|216|6526$أَنتُمْ|you|54|76|796$وَءَابَآؤُكُم|and your forefathers,|161|172|6527$مَّآ|not|42|65|262$أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ|has Allah sent down|153|176|863$بِهَا|for it|52|75|1203$مِن|any|50|73|53$سُلْطَـٰنٍ‌ۚ|authority.|87|110|6529$إِن|Not|44|55|225$يَتَّبِعُونَ|they follow|93|102|3921$إِلَّا|except|65|82|86$ٱلظَّنَّ|assumption|94|111|5973$وَمَا|and what|82|99|46$تَهْوَى|desire|75|92|5143$ٱلْأَنفُسُ‌ۖ|the(ir) souls.|105|122|4514$وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|116|640$جَآءَهُم|has come to them|140|188|853$مِّن|from|50|147|53$رَّبِّهِمُ|their Lord|83|180|10409$ٱلْهُدَىٰٓ|the guidance.|111|160|1113$

name: Kids
text: فَلِلَّهِ|But for Allah|101|193|6161$ٱلْأَخِرَةُ|(is) the last|98|282|890$وَٱلْأُولَىٰ|and the first.|107|199|16270$

name: Kids
text: ۞ وَكَم|And how many|117|132|6245$مِّن|of|50|79|53$مَّلَكٍ|(the) Angels|102|131|16271$فِى|in|48|77|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|144|351$لَا|not|42|71|30$تُغْنِى|will avail|75|90|8330$شَفَـٰعَتُهُمْ|their intercession|134|145|14467$شَيْــًٔا|anything|77|98|472$إِلَّا|except|65|86|86$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|112|280$أَن|[that]|60|81|655$يَأْذَنَ ٱللَّهُ|Allah has given permission|192|203|16272$لِمَن|for whom|81|184|1356$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|274|867$وَيَرْضَىٰٓ|and approves.|114|217|16273$

name: Kids
text: إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|83|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|116|20$لَا|(do) not|75|102|30$يُؤْمِنُونَ|believe|94|121|35$بِٱلْأَخِرَةِ|in the Hereafter,|130|157|824$لَيُسَمُّونَ|surely they name|134|147|16274$ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ|the Angels|94|195|3047$تَسْمِيَةَ|name(s)|78|280|16275$ٱلْأُنثَىٰ|(of) female,|98|199|16266$

name: Kids
text: وَلِلَّهِ|And for Allah|104|110|1070$مَا|(is) whatever|109|122|262$فِى|(is) in|58|71|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|128|351$وَمَا|and whatever|111|124|46$فِى|(is) in|58|71|89$ٱلْأَرْضِ|the earth|92|98|100$لِيَجْزِىَ|that He may recompense|186|206|8017$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|129|20$أَسَـٰٓـــُٔواْ|do evil|79|119|13701$بِمَا|with what|86|126|43$عَمِلُواْ|they have done|124|144|6052$وَيَجْزِىَ|and recompense|128|170|16278$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|174|20$أَحْسَنُواْ|do good|90|175|3511$بِٱلْحُسْنَى|with the best.|114|156|16279$

name: Kids
text: أَفَرَءَيْتَ|Did you see|97|190|11287$ٱلَّذِى|the one who|103|289|138$تَوَلَّىٰ|turned away|103|196|1801$

name: Kids
text: أَلَّا|That not|78|98|2011$تَزِرُ|will bear|74|115|6234$وَازِرَةٌ|a bearer of burdens|150|191|6235$وِزْرَ|(the) burden|104|145|6236$أُخْرَىٰ|(of) another,|106|126|4392$

name: Kids
text: ثُمَّ|Then|53|86|293$يُجْزَٮٰهُ|he will be recompensed for it|211|277|16293$ٱلْجَزَآءَ|the recompense|126|192|16294$ٱلْأَوْفَىٰ|the fullest|87|120|16295$

name: Kids
text: وَأَنَّهُۥ|And that He|100|125|7215$خَلَقَ|created|71|122|299$ٱلزَّوْجَيْنِ|the pairs,|106|156|16300$ٱلذَّكَرَ|the male|77|128|16301$وَٱلْأُنثَىٰ|and the female|119|144|1547$

name: Kids
text: وَقَوْمَ|And (the) people|132|144|12771$نُوحٍ|(of) Nuh|75|99|4641$مِّن قَبْلُ‌ۖ|before.|92|116|250$إِنَّهُمْ|Indeed, they|105|129|106$كَانُواْ هُمْ|they were|103|127|16306$أَظْلَمَ|more unjust|98|110|177$وَأَطْغَىٰ|and more rebellious.|152|152|16307$

name: Kids
text: فَبِأَىِّ|Then which (of)|126|163|7041$ءَالَآءِ|the Favors|91|165|16312$رَبِّكَ|(of) your Lord,|117|191|1322$تَتَمَارَىٰ|will you doubt?|119|156|16313$
